definition: (coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
(negative prefix)/not/no
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
no/is not/not
fault/blame
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
surname Yao
immediately/at once
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
(question particle for "yes-no" questions)

this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
not at all/emphatically not
see 可不是[ke3 bu5 shi4]
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
